flawed_nl_solution:
One quarter of $4 is (1/4)*$4 = $<<(1/4)*4=16/1>>16/1
20 cents will buy 1 candy so 1600 cents will buy 1600/20 = <<1600/20=80>>80 candies

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1, not 16/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
